unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Needed badly after that freak hailstorm in Punjab last year! 15/03/2023 I remember farmers like Ramlal struggling. Heard PMFBY payout was slow. Is it really helping small guys in Bihar too? Hopefully, things improve before next season. Need a proper solution by 10/10/2024, else everyone's doomed. Check the fine print though, at 14:00 hrs! Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, eh? Needed badly after that freak hailstorm in Punjab last year! fifteenth March two thousand and twenty three I remember farmers like Ramlal struggling. Heard P M F B Y payout was slow. Is it really helping small guys in Bihar too? Hopefully, things improve before next season. Need a proper solution by tenth October two thousand and twenty four, else everyone's doomed. Check the fine print though, at two P M! Jai Kisan!
